title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Cognitive Function and Academic Achievement Support Strategies for Children with Epilepsy

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational educational psychology, special education theories, and general awareness of neurological disorders
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Explain at least three impacts of socioeconomic factors on cognitive development in children with epilepsy
Design five customized instructional strategies to enhance academic achievement in children with epilepsy
Develop an assessment system for monitoring cognitive function changes from a longitudinal perspective
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
